results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: This verse assures that God is always present, providing strength and companionship.
results.reflection: Even in loneliness, God’s presence offers unwavering support.

results.text: Turn to me and be gracious to me, for I am lonely and afflicted.
results.reason: The psalmist's plea reflects a genuine cry for God’s companionship in times of loneliness.
results.reflection: In moments of solitude, God hears our cries and extends His grace.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus’ promise of His constant presence provides comfort and assurance.
results.reflection: Christ's eternal presence is a balm for the lonely heart.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: God’s promise of support and presence alleviates the fear of isolation.
results.reflection: God's strength and help are ever-present, dispelling loneliness.

results.text: I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you.
results.reason: Jesus reassures His followers of His return and ongoing presence.
results.reflection: We are never abandoned; Jesus promises to be with us always.
